feed.title: Abacus Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.20.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.20.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • version/0.19.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/316
  • Added new selectable gradient + accent colors by @marcelweikum in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/320
  • marcelweikum:fix/bills by @marcelweikum in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.18.0...0.20.0

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.20.1
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.20.1 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • translation/slovenian by @thehijacker in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/329
  • translation/korean by @JerryHyun in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/327
  • translation/italian by @gablau in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/333

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.21.0
entry.content:
After successful App Store/Google Play reviews, version 0.21.0 will be available here:

iOS: apps.apple.com Android: play.google.com

What's Changed

  • translation/turkish by @nizarcan in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/349
  • Fix net worth Chart by @gablau in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/357
  • Updated Slovenian translation by @thehijacker in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/367
  • Add new quick option(s) by @aitor-gamarra in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/361
  • Added "no category", "total spent" and "per day" to Categories screen by @gablau in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/362
  • version/0.21.0 by @victorbalssa in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/371

New Contributors

  • @nizarcan made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/349
  • @aitor-gamarra made their first contribution in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/361

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.20.1...0.21.0

entry.title: New release for Abacus: 0.21.2
entry.content:
OTA Patch - 0.21.2

  • Settings screen fix
  • Categories screen - Added transaction search by tapping on the item by @gablau in https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/pull/375

Full Changelog: https://github.com/victorbalssa/abacus/compare/0.21.1...0.21.2
